Key:
(Finals were over, and it was just before summer
break. I was on my way to a school retreat with
Tohka and the girls.)

(However, our trip quickly took a turn, thanks
to the Deus Ex Machina, aka DEM Company, an
organization who's after the Spirits.)

(When we arrived to Arubi Island, I encountered
the twin Spirits, the Yamai Sisters, who could
manipulate the wind.)

Hmph. What a joke. Accept me as the one and
only true Yamai Spirit.

Denial. I am the one who will survive. Kaguya,
you are unfit to carry the Yamai name.

(The two were competing to be the best Yamai
with their charm. Only one problem, I was made
the judge. So whoever wooed me was the winner.)
Shido. Tomorrow, I want you to choose Yuzuru.

Request. Shido, please select Kaguya as the
winner.

(Deep down, each of them cared for the
other. I stressed about the dilemma, so I
decided to consult with Tohka.)
WHAT THE HELL?!

(However, even as the two tried currying my
favor, my message got through to them. They
ended up battling until the very end.)

(Tohka and I tried to stop then, but a wizard
working under DEM, Ellen Mira Mathers, arrived to
snatch Tohka away with the Bander Snatch doll.)
TOHKAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!

(When Tohka was in danger, a shining sword
appeared. It was Tohka's Angel, Sandalphon.
But she wasn't able to wield it.)

(Thanks to the Fraxinus' attack on DEM's battleship,
the Bander Snatch began to malfunction, allowing
Tohka and I to get to the Yamai Sisters.)
Please... Stop fighting!

(Tohka pushed me, and I put a stop to their
battle with Sandalphon. I cried out to them
both...)
I choose... both of you!

Please! Trust me! Just once! Give me a chance
to save the both of you!
I don't want to die...
I want to live. I want to be with Yuzuru more.
Response. Me too.

Statement. I do not wish to disappear.
I want to live with Kaguya.

(Kaguya and Yuzuru made up, and I sealed
their Spirit powers. We gained a pair of new
friends who could now attend school with us.)

(By the time of the Tenou Festival, I met
my sixth Spirit.)

Huh? Why are you grabbing onto me? Why
haven't you fallen? Why haven't you died?

Back away from this stage and this world
this instant!

(The sixth Spirit, Miku Izayoi, was just like
Kotori. A former human. She hated men. As
a counter-measure, Kotori had a plan...)
Good luck... Onee-chan.
(...It involved me dressing as a girl.)

Like I said, let's compete. Hm... Okay, fine.
During the Tenou Festival, if Raizen wins,
you can seal my Spirit. How about that?

(Miku wasn't concerned about others unless
it worked in her favor. She challenged me at
the Tenou Festival, and I accepted.)

(On the day of the festival, there was a
big stage.)

(Miku put on a dazzling performance, and then
it was my turn. However, due to an unexpected
accident, we were missing a bandmate.)

(We invited the Yamai Sisters to join our band.
Tohka's voice won us many fans, but we got 2nd
place. Miku won... or so we thought.)

Stop it... I-I won... I won fair and square!
They... They weren't doing their jobs!

(Miku's onstage victory was obvious. However,
for the mock store portion, Raizen took the win.
That put us ahead overall.)

Friendship? Bonds...? Let me prove to you that
none of that means anything to me!

(Miku was unsatisfied with the result and
activated her Angel, Gabriel.)

(Not only did she manage to brainwash the Yamai
sisters, but also Yoshino, Kotori, and many
civilians who heard her voice through the speaker.)

(Just then, Ellen intervened, once again to
capture me and Tohka. Tohka allowed me to
escape, but was captured by DEM.)
Damn it... This isn't the time for this. I...

(With my friends brainwashed, and Tohka
taken by DEM, I couldn't do anything to fight
back. But once again, she came to save the day.)

Hehehe. Looking glum. You seem to be in a
bind. Hey, Shido-san? Want to fill me in on
what's going on?
Kurumi... Tokisaki?!

(I was in a desperate situation, and there
stood the only Spirit I couldn't seal, Kurumi.)

(Kurumi said she'd lend me a hand to fulfill
her goal, so we formed a temporary truce and
headed to Miku to save Tohka.)

I see. Let's make a deal. Instead of me sealing
your powers, I can change them to something
else. But you have to listen to me.

What are you talking about...? That won't
change anything―
I want you to help me save Tohka.

(With the help of Kurumi's power, I learned
about Miku's past and how to communicate
with her. I told her we needed to save Tohka.)

(We had no choice but to leave Miku behind.
Thanks to Kurumi's clone, we learned where
Tohka was being kept.)

(DEM Company's Japan branch, the first
location. That was our destination.)
Now, it's time.
That's right.
Let's start our date.
Let's start our date.

(Kurumi told me she had another mission, so we
parted ways. Mana claimed to leave DEM, and Kotori,
freed from Miku's control, helped me save Tohka.)
Hmph. How pathetic. Gabriel... SOLO!

(As I headed to Tohka, I felt ready to faint.
But it was Miku who saved me.)
What? Miku... You remembered your promise?
Don't get me mistaken, okay?

I toooootally don't care at all about someone
who spreads hate!

I came here because I wanted to add another
Spirit into my collection.
Thanks!

(Miku then told me herself about her past.
She suffered a trauma as an idol that made
her lose her voice. She was so confused...)

Spirit powers don't matter. Even if you
lose your voice, that doesn't mean you're
worthless!
What... I don't believe you!

Every fan who said so never believed me!
When I went through hard times...
No one was there for me!

I don't agree! I'm sure there are fans who
believe in you and are waiting for you! But
if what you said was true, I'll be there for you!

(As I made this vow to Miku, we reached the
final door. Beyond it... was Tohka.)

I am Shido Itsuka. I've come to save Tohka!
Let go of her immediately!

(I barged in, but Ellen launched an attack at
me that hurt me pretty badly.)
Agh...

Stop! Stop! Please stop...! Anything but him!
Anything but Shido! I care not what happens
to me! I'll do anything! I concede!
So... Please do not take Shido from me!

(My life was at risk, and Tohka fell into
despair, which led to the worst-case
scenario. Sephira's Inverse.)

(DEM realized they couldn't take down Tohka
and retreated. In order to get Tohka back to
normal, Miku and I fought her.)

(But we were powerless against Tohka's
attacks. As she struck Miku, I panicked, and
I felt energy surge in my left hand.)
What are you...?
I promised.

(I used Zadkiel's power to protect Miku, and
when Miku's brainwash abilities wore off,
Yoshino and the Yamai Sisters came as back up.)
Yo, Tohka. I've come to save you.
Shi...do?

(I descended to where Tohka was and planted
a soft kiss on her lips. I felt a sense of déjà vu.
When our lips parted, Tohka returned to normal.)
Welcome back, Tohka.
I am back, Shido...

(And so, we were able to rescue Tohka
without losing anyone. As for Miku...)
OH! You've come for me, darling!
D-Darling?!

(She totally changed. I was so surprised
when Miku kissed me gently.)

Even if I lose my voice, even if no one hears
me sing again, as long as I have you, that's all
that matters. I will sing for you, and only you.

(Miku made this promise, and smiled from
ear to ear.)

(A few days after I sealed Miku, Reine-san
called me in to test a new game.)
(It was a virtual reality game called My Little

Operator: Shido 2". Unlike other games, it required me to
enter a VR-world in order to play it.)"

Key:
(Everyone watched as I fumbled through the
game. However, I spotted someone mysterious,
even by video game standards.)

...Let me ask you.
...Love.
...What is love?

(I met an interesting girl named Arusu, and
then a bug occurred inside of the game, trapping
me by preventing me from logging out.)

(However, in order to learn what love is, Arusu
claimed she needed to perform simulations,
calling in some familiar faces.)

(The only way I could return to reality was by
teaching Arusu love. So, I went on a ton of
dates.)

Oh... sorry. Are you the staff here? You were so
beautiful that I thought you were a doll.

My, you're very kind. I'm the owner of this shop.
My name is Tohka.

(There was Tohka, the sophisticated store
clerk.)
H-Hey. Don't put your hand in there.

Hehehe... You were bratty, but your spirit tastes
pretty good.

Heavenly. I feel like I'm going to melt. Hehe. Shido,
don't worry. I won't take your life.
(Kaguya and Yuzuru became succubi.)
I'll make you forget. All your sorrows, everything.
No, Shido-san! Yoshinon... is watching.

(There was Yoshino, widowed from her
partner, Yoshinon.)
Here we go, twirly-twirly ♪
Twirly-twirly!
Twirly-twirly ♪
Twirly! Twirly!

(And at the maid café, Kuru―no, actually,
let's forget this one.)

(As I went about my daily life, I met the
black-haired Arusu.)
I am Arusu. There is no doubt about it... I am Arusu.
I see... I suppose so.

Hm... Let's see. I am Arusu. But I guess I could also
say that I'm not Arusu.

(White and black. There were two Arusus,
leading to me naming the white version.)
How about Maria? Sorry, I just thought of it.
No. I want it... Maria, Maria Arusu. My... name.

(She seemed to like her name, so from that
moment on, she became known as Maria.)

(Each time my love for someone grew, the
world reset. Maria would learn something new
about love, and soon acquired new emotions.)

Yes. That is right. That is how everyone
else conveyed their love to Shido. At the
end of a date, you must kiss.

If I do that, I am sure, I will fully understand
love. If I do that, then Shido... and the others
will be released from this world.

(Maria had an idea, and we decided to go
on a date together.)

(We went to school early, walked home
together after class. We even got closer
with Tohka and the others.)

(On my first full day of dating Maria,
things took a turn... At the end of the day,
we kissed.)
What is this...? My powers are, aaaah!
Maria... Hey, Maria?!

Good grief. You made me wait quite a while.
But at long last, the time has come.

(Maria was unconsciously holding a great
power. By learning emotions, she accidentally
ceded control of the game to the black Arusu.)

Don't call me by her name! I have my
own name, my actual name... Marina Arusu.
The name my father bestowed to me!
Marina... That's your name?

(Marina revealed the truth. Maria was a
copy of Marina. That's why we were trapped
here.)

(As a creation of DEM, her mission was to
destroy the game and seize control of the
Fraxinus to destroy the real Tengu City.)

(We moved to stop her. I made it to Marina, but by
then, she had assumed a massive amount of power.)

Ngh... This might be... too much. No... I'll
endure this! I'll protect Maria, even if it
kills me!

Please, give me the strength to protect Shido.
I... wish to protect Shido. I do not want to
lose him... for everyone, and for myself.

(The world responded to Maria's wish,
allowing her to manifest an Astral Dress.
This power turned the tide.)

It would never bend in your favor! You're
destined to disappear, like any copy would!
I am the One who will defeat you, begone!

Let us combine forces for one more powerful
attack. Marina is likely expecting it as well.
Got it! GOOOOOOO!!

(Thanks to Maria, I was able to summon
Sandalphon. With Marina taken out, the
virtual world ceased, but at a cost...)

(Marina, now bracing for defeat, became
unstable, and threatened to drop the Fraxinus
on top of Tengu City.)

Does that mean both of you will disappear?
No, you absolutely can't!

This is the best chance we have. For
everyone―for you―to live.

(I wanted to stop her, even if it meant risking
Marina's life. Maria steeled her resolve, and
headed for Marina.)

(I couldn't believe they would disappear. With
Tohka and the rest of the girls' help, Maria and
I barged into the mother room.)
Maria, Marina! It can't end like this!

It is too late. It is impossible to reset the
Fraxinus' authority control and for Marina
to disappear alone.

(No matter what, I couldn't have saved them.
In the end, I could only let them go.)
Thank you, Shido. You are the kindest soul.
Maria! MARIAAAAAAAAA!

(Marina disappeared, as did Maria. But not
before she left me with a kiss. Then, the
virtual world disappeared with both Arusus.)

(I awoke to find myself back in the real
world. Of course, the Arusus weren't there.)

(I felt empty. In the end, I couldn't save them.
But Maria left a message for me, detailing her
true feelings.)

Most of all, Shido. The time I spent with you, even
the times you do not remember, are treasures to
me. Thanks to you... I learned the answer.

(In that message was a file. It automatically
installed into my phone. Marina's last gesture.)
M-Maria?! Is that really you, Maria?!
Yes. It is your Maria.

(Before Maria disappeared, it seems Marina
copied Maria's personality data and compiled
an app.)

I swear to devote myself to helping you,
Shido. That is why you mustn't give up.
Ever. Please be strong.
Yeah, I'll do my best. I swear that I'll save them.
(And even now, my date goes on...)
